steps.content: Web3 payments refer to the use of blockchain technology to facilitate the exchange of digital assets. In the new age of the web, known as Web3, decentralized internet applications are built on a blockchain network. Web3 payments allow users to send, receive, and store digital assets securely without the need for intermediaries like banks or payment processors. These payments are entirely peer-to-peer and are built on trustless logical systems, meaning that no one has to rely on a third party to facilitate the transaction.
